posts.postText: Seriously, it is really overpowered. I killed 3 traitors one round with it, and I never took any damage because it kills so quickly.

I can add some more delay to it, but it encourages traitors to quickly get rid of the detective. It can be dropped, but once dropped it is removed. So, it's not that overpowered against a knife... Or a bullet to the head

Actually, one I was alone with 2 people in peaches_castle and one of them pulled out his knife and was about to hit me but I saw it, shot and instantly he was dead. Then I spun around and killed the other one, who was also a traitor, before he could even shoot. So it is definitely overpowered against a knife.
A delay really needs to be added. It reloads in a second flat :/
